entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
